articles.author: AP
articles.title: Afghan survivors of US drone strike: Sorry 'is not enough' - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: KABUL: Sorry is not enough for the Afghan survivors of an errant US drone strike that killed 10 members of their family, including seven children.
articles.content: Afghan survivors of US drone strike: Sorry 'is not enough'

articles.author: Stephen Dziedzic
articles.title: Malaysia warns Australia nuclear submarine project could 'provoke other powers' in Asia - ABC News
articles.description: Malaysia joins criticism of Australia's plan to build nuclear-powered submarines, warning it could spark a renewed arms race in the region, while the diplomatic crisis with France sparked by the decision continues to escalate.

articles.title: S'pore police part of Interpol op against illegal football gambling during Euro 2020 - The Straits Times
articles.description: Over $600m in bets involved and nearly 1,400 people in Asia and Europe nabbed.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
